content.detailedDescription: Me and my brother stepped on the back patio for a cigarette at about 23:21 i pointed out what i thought was a satellite given its linear path and star like brightness. i pointed it out to my brother and then seconds later it got a lot brighter like something breaching the atmosphere and we figured we were witnessing something orbiting back into the atmosphere until it then changed direction and seemingly left our atmosphere til it was too dim to observe any longer
content.summary: Moved and looked like satellite brightened 5 times in size and then dimmed and changed direction upwards and faded into the distance

content.detailedDescription: I was running with my dad and we looked above us and we saw a rectangled shape ufo and it was hovering above a power station it hovered for about 2 minutes and we didnt no who to call so we did not ring anybody and the next day it was in all the papers in the uk.The ufo just vanished.
content.summary: I was running with my dad and we saw a ufo near a power station around 2 o clock in the uk near haverfordwest in 2007

content.detailedDescription: It was 6:20 in the morning and i was walking home from a friend's house. i always just stare at the sky and think while walking. i saw a strange orb of light moving sporadically and tried to record it. however, it would not show up on my camera. i watched it for about 30 more seconds before i saw one of those planes that produce trails heading for it. the unidentifiable object flew about 50-100 feet below it and right as they were lined up, disappeared.
content.summary: Strange light. flew sporadic. after passing about 50 feet under plane it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
June 15, 2017

on wednesday morning, june 14, 2017, at approximately 4:00 a.M., i was up early and took out my trash to the dumpster in our apartment complex. i noticed a very bright light in the eastern sky. i did not have my glasses on, so i went back into our apartment to get my glasses, camera, camcorder, and binoculars. i looked through the binoculars and noticed that it was not a plane, helicopter, balloon of any kind, meteorite, comet, planet, moon, star, reflection, or anything that i had ever seen before. i woke up my son and fiance so they could witness the object with me.
   i started filming it with my camcorder. i had forgotten to set the time ahead one hour on the most recent daylight savings time, so the camcorder time read about 3:00 a.M. instead of the actual time of about 4:00 a.M. even though my camcorder is a very inexpensive camcorder, i managed to get several closeups which show a very compelling view of the object. since i do not have a tripod, i tried to hold the camcorder still as best i could. the best way i can describe the object is it looked like there had been a circle, and approximately a one-quarter slice of the circle had been removed. 
   the object would appear like a diamond at certain points, and appear to retract into a smaller size, and appear more distant, then, suddenly, it would expand into a larger shape, and appear to be closer. the object, (when i would zoom in on it), would appear to glow and pulsate, (somewhat like a heartbeat). the surface also appeared to have several patterns and shapes like craters, mountain ranges, and various other patterns. the color, (most of the time), looked like it was a huge chunk of plaster, (but with various shapes and patterns on its surface.
   there also appeared to be a green outline around the object. i also observed what appeared to be a black or blue object that passed in front of it. at one point, (for about two minutes), another object appeared into the frame of my camcorder. it appeared to be a bright, orange color, and appeared as if it was another type of shape of which i could not identify.
content.summary: Witnessed and filmed ufo on or about 4:00 a.M. on wednesday, june 14, 2017.

content.detailedDescription: Spotted over mt. west/nw of avra valley roughly in the direction of the mountain range in between kit peak observatory and the copper mine or as if you were at the end of avra valley road going west. helicopter came before sighting. lasted maybe 5 mins. 8 to 10 dots blinking back and forth in a line. then they came together as 1 or 2 then disappeared.
content.summary: Spotted over avra valley

content.detailedDescription: 1. where were you and what were you doing at the time? i was at work giving someone their food and it was night around 9:30. at first i just felt like looking up to see if there was anything going on because i heard a soft noise. i looked up to my right and i saw this triangle shaped figure. i tried to tell myself that it was a plane. and i said to myself, "what is that?" out loud and my customer heard me. he tried to see what i was looking at and i told him , and tried to tell myself, that it was just a plane or helicopter. i noticed it though, because i have always been into ufo's and conspiracy theories. but i still tried to not think of it as a ufo because it would have been crazy. people would have thought i was crazy. it happened not too fast but i could not have gotten my phone to take a photo because it would have been gone. the object had three bright lights. the top was a solid white, the bottom right was a solid blue, and the bottom left was a flashing white light. the object was moving too fast to be a plane or a helicopter and also flying way too low to be either as well. so i couldn't help myself and say it was definitely a ufo. i honestly felt so shocked and astonished, and i still am. i told my sister and my boyfriend and they listened, they didn't believe me. i know what i saw and i am so stunned. i have seen many before but not this close, not this bright, and definitely not in front of customers. i lost sight of the object when it went over the building. i stood there not knowing what to do for a moment.
content.summary: I was working, looked to my right, saw the ufo going not too fast. flashing blue, white lights. one solid white light. triangle shape.

content.detailedDescription: No stars were out,  few clouds.   noticed bright star in the sky stationary and the it brightened then faded away within 5-8 seconds.  it was super bright.   brighter than any star i've ever seen.   when it disappeared it went almost strait up.  it went away from the earth.  it was on route 30a coming up from fonda on the left. i was thinking why is this star out and why so bright.   then when it brightened and disappeared and  knew it was not from this earth.  then i looked it up today and was amazed that others say the same thing across the world around the same days.
content.summary: Bright light in the sky that brightened the disappeared and faded

content.detailedDescription: I was getting ready for bed and turning all the lights off around the flat when i looked out of my back window to discover this object hovering in the sky above the city. i quickly grabbed my phone and got a pretty decent shot before rushing to my partner and tell them what i witnessed. when we returned to look out the window, the object was gone.
content.summary: I don't know how to explain what i just saw this evening but i managed to get a picture of it before it vanished. i hope it returns!

content.detailedDescription: While my daughter and i sat in the back yard, we saw a silver sphere float across the sky. it lasted 5 minutes and was watched with naked eyes and binoculars. it was not a balloon. it was metallic.
content.summary: Silver sphere floating across sky

content.detailedDescription: At about 9pm last night while our youngest daughter was eating dinner my wife and i heard a loud helicopter outside. as we are used to military helicopters flying over we ran outside to see if it was. when we saw it was only a regular one we sent our youngest back inside to finish eating. my wife then saw a light above her head moving at a slow but steady pace. it was a solid white light with no sound or no other blinking lights. we watched it as it flew what would say is possibly east occasionally making little side to side motions. we continued to watch it till it began to blink then disappeared. we then had an airplane fly over at about the same height and you could not only see the other blinking lights but hear it. my wife went inside and checked her phone which has an app that shows stars, planets, constellations and even the flight paths of planes and the only plane in our area at that time was the one we saw and heard.
content.summary: A bright light moving with a slight zig zag.

content.detailedDescription:
I will report on yesterday. but today i  went out to see if any where still here and one close to me was. so i  waverd to it. and sent a message telepathic message. i  said "good morning i see you". then i made it in sign language. that's when the ship began to disappear completely. but then all of a sudden a airplane appeared. small plane no sound and no front propeller. it began to circle and i  thought it's about time mufon shrouded up and it disappeared. just as quickly as it appeared. they did tell me they have to stay and protect the area to day. they wouldn't say why. i  ran out of cards for my camera. i did see yesterday something they left in the ground pic's of them self in a way. then last night they where ginger through the pictures i took through my mind. they where shuffling through them and it work me when i saw 3 pictures i took right there. loud and clear. they stopped when i blocked them and they also stopped when i  was wide awake. they got what they where looking for. they where not on the trailer this time to do this. but they where above me hovering in there ship. 
 all of this sound like one hell of a faery tail, even to me as i  write it down.  but it's not.
content.summary: Ship in cloud former disappeared then a airplane appeared. it made no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home and had a need to go outside for some reason.  i always look up at the sky.  it was clear and cold. i was looking up and saw a bright orange/red light.  i thought it was a plane but then as i continued to watch i saw that it was moving to strangely to be a plane.  it was stopped and then it would move again.  no sound at all.  i then saw another orange red light and that one headed towards the other one and then they both went the other direction across the sky.  soon there was a third.  they were kind of doing a dance and i knew these were not planes or fireworks, they were something else.  i was so excited.  i ran inside and got my camera which is just a fine pix fuji but i had to try and get some pictures.  so i continue to watch and i am watching this dance and then all of a sudden one after the other these things shoot straight up into the sky and are gone.  in a blink they are gone.  i had no doubt they were craft.  i had seen previously in broad daylight years before the things that look like a fleet of balloons doing all kinds of crazy maneuvers with 2 other people.  we never talked about it but to say "did you see that?"  we had watched for what seemed like a half hour. when we went inside 3 hours had passed.  when i saw those same "balloons" on a youtube video i freaked out and thought "i'm not crazy!, there they are".  unfortunately i did not have a camera with me.  

i loaded the pictures from my camera to my computer and saw how small they were and thought "bummer".  later though i was looking at them and i zoomed in on them and they looked so strange.  i did think about doing something with them but i didn't know who to contact to have a look and frankly i was afraid to be considered a nut job.  then i found you guys on youtube and watched your videos and heard that you were very well respected and the real deal so i'm sending them to you.  they are small but i know you guys have better equipment to look at them. if they are nothing at least i know but i don't think that is the case.  the movement was just too strange.  i saw something similar to this in the 70s and also on christmas eve a few years ago.  then i even could hear a neighbor saying "do you see that?" to someone.  i was in the back yard and ran out front to see who it was but i couldn't find anything.  i even posted on facebook that i just saw either santa's sleigh or a ufo.  one of my friends asked what i was drinking.  if i recall right someone had gotten a picture and reported it.  i saw the info online not too long ago.  i think you guys do such a great job and hopefully you can tell me something, it's bugged me for awhile and i'm glad that i finally got the nerve to contact you.  thank you!
content.summary: Lights that tracked down and then back up changed places and then shot off into the night.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my truck organizing a few papers, when i noticed the strange weather and fast moving clouds that night, when i noticed the object i noticed it was hovering and making no noise. i was confused after the object started moving slowly above the tree tops but figured it wasn't a plane or helicopter after the object would stop a few times before taking off in a straight line. i lost sight of it as it flew into the distance.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright green glowing disk shaped object hovering without any sound coming from it. flying extremly slow before taking off suddenly.

content.detailedDescription:
I unknowingly recorded on a quadcopter camera a large black sphere that was hovering almost directly over my operating position on the afternoon of saturday, 10 may 2017.  my second flight i was facing eastward operating  my drone within the confines of the parking lot of bay point marina, norfolk virginia.  it was breezy which required dipping the drone often to keep it close .  i brought it down changed the battery then took off again only to end up in a tree.  after retrieving the quadcopter i then moved my operating position to the center of the parking lot facing south.  after launching again, a really sharp looking light blue bell jeranger  helicopter came hauling ass eastward over pretty lake and stopped directly in front of me adjacent to bay point marina.  i thought perhaps i had been sited by norfolk international airport as their flight path is about a 3/4 mile away.  i brought the drone down immediately because the jetranger pilot tripped his cyclic hard left/fwd accelerating in a tight arc directly over my position scaring the crap out of me.  i quickly grabbed my quadcopter and hopped in my truck and went home.  

    the following day i transferred the video filed onto my computer for review.    when i watched the second drone flight video i noted an anomaly at top rh corner at time signature  01:07.  the drone then does one spin and dip and at time signature 01:18 - 01:20 the black sphere clearly appears almost directly over and above where i was sitting on the tailgate of my truck.  i never heard or saw the sphere hovering behind me . based of the proximity go the houses below and the spheres hovering position i would estimate it to be approximately 3.5 to 4 foot in diameter.

    it was at that moment i realized  that i was not the reason the jetranger overflew me flying my cheap little plastic quadcopter.  i hypothesize that due the proximity and size of that the orf faa radar operator picked the object on his screen and dispatched the  helicopter to investigate.  

  i sure wish i had seen the hovering sphere with my own two eyes but having it on video as poor a quality that it is, is still very interesting.  the third flight video show the helicopters pursuit of the sphere.   i would sure like to find that pilot and ask him a few questions.  it appeared to be a civilian helicopter as i saw only the n—— number painted on the aft fuselage and no other markings.

    these are all the details i can recall of the black sphere ufo event.
content.summary: Black sphere recorded by by toy quadcopter cam unknown to operator at time of event.  helicopter gave chase.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my yard with my mom and happened to look up and seen 1 orangish pulsating light in the front, then two more side by side behind the first one and then one more in the rear. kinda like a diamond shape. watched them for a few minutes heading ne till they just disappeared. it was a clear night so i'm pretty sure they didn't go behind a cloud, they were just gone. the two in the middle were close to each other and there was no sound. i will swear to this till the day i die and wish i could take a lie detector test to prove it.
content.summary: seen 1 pulsating light in front, 2 next to each other in the middle and 1 in the rear. then they faded away

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work on jun 11th 2017 at 6:36 am i seen a brilliant bright light with an orb like around it. it was daylight but i could see the moon in background, i stopped my car to try to take a picture and it disappeared superfast. after it left i headed to work and continued to see the dot in my eyes. that's how bright it was. i thought it may have been a star at first but then it moved slowly at first then super speed into the sky. it was much bigger than any star.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Was heading west seen superbright circle. hovered then disappeared really fast

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting in my garden looking at the red kite birds of prey that were flying up high as it was a hot morning and they like to fly up with the thermals, suddenly and from out of nowhere appeared a chevron/ boomerang shaped craft just bellow the grey cloud a bit forward of where i was sitting, at first (split second) i thought it was a huge shadow of some sort of aircraft or giant microlight, it was a bit darker than the grey cloud but its edges were perfectly sharp, not as if it was blurred by clouds but it only had this perfect shape, no bits sticking out and no pattern or markings. as i spotted it, it was in motion from the start (this thing was huge!) it flew in a straight line over my head, i shot from my chair to see it flying some more and when it hit blue sky it completely disappeared only to reappear when it was under the cover (but not in) another cloud far in the distance?? this thing was nothing i had ever seen before and was not some aircraft that we know of (well, not me anyway) in this world, it made me feel very frightened as it was so big and didn't seem earthly! i went in the house and couldn't stop shaking for about 20 mins and felt very spooked by the whole thing. i have always looked at films and heard stories of ufo's but always took them with a pinch of salt but now i have seen this with my own eyes!!! other people i have told obviously don't believe what i saw, but i know what i saw and my partner wishes he had seen it because he is quite a believer.
content.summary: Huge flying object appeared just below clouds, looked like a shadow but seemed solid, it was flying when it appeared as if from nowhere, disappered as it hit blue sky then re appeared as it hit cloud again in distance, was completely unnerving.

content.detailedDescription: I went for a walk and took some pictures of a small runway at a small airport later after looking at the pictures i noticed some spots in them while i was taking the photos around supper i didn't see or hear anything and the aky was blue i had the camera setting on noir
content.summary: I took some photos with my cell phone and noticed the orbs then but not while taking the pictures

content.detailedDescription: I will be as descriptive as possible. night fishing out of sheepshead bay brooklyn and the boat goes out to the breezy point atlantic side of the beach. 2 hours out and i happen to look up and see a light, rectangular light the size of a football field facing north. it caught my attention because this light was very long. airliners have small round beams of light this was huge. the strangest thing is that it was a clear night and the stars were visible behind and around the object . visible to the point that a object emitting this kind of light would have been seen, blocked out some of the stars, made some sort of noise but you could not see or hear anything. all i saw was the light facing away from the boat towards shore or north and the stars shining through it, whatever it was. a cloud of smoke started to cover the light completely and it was gone. no noise, no sound, nothing obscuring the stars. i will wait for your response and do not patronize what i saw. this was not ours.
content.summary: I will be as descriptive as possible. night fishing out of sheepshead bay brooklyn and the boat goes out to the breezy point atlantic side of the beach. 2 hours out and i happen to look up and see a light, rectangular light the size of a football field fa

content.detailedDescription: My husband and our 2 boys were at a pelicans baseball game in myrtle beach. he saw a weird fireball like light in the sky and watched it for a while and then started recording it. it then "dropped"/broke-off/dispersed into more lights/fireballs. they all hovered, then zig zagged then fell some. eventually lost sight behind trees. there was no sound that was noticeable.Lots of people in the stands were watching it so plenty of witnesses.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Single object fireball like seen falling then several more lights "dropped" from it and hovered

content.detailedDescription: Object glowing star like circling in multiple directions report written while watching object. airplain flew past as object started moving.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Circling high speed object

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i went outside in maricopa az and noticed a large, bright orange light in the sky. we observed it for a while and another one appeared to the left of the first one. we initially thought it was paper lanterns. then the newer one faded out, followed by the other one fading. we kept watching and the first light reappeared, slightly to the east. the second one came back as well. they both disappeared again, gently fading out. the first one kept coming back more and more to the east every 3-5 minutes. this lasted for approximately 30 minutes. while the lights were visible they were mainly orange but would sometimes flash white and green. our dogs were acting anxious and acted strange throughout the event. the object went too far east to see after a while.
content.summary: Two lights hovering then disappearing and reappearing and moving in a path

content.detailedDescription:
on saturday june 10th 2017, i thomas allen mcnabb was practicing flying a quadcopter with a camera mounted on the bottom in a empty parking lot at bay point marina where my girlfriend resides at a condominium a block away.  after retrieving my quadcopter from a tree i continued for a second flight.  it was breezy and which required occasionally dipping  the quad to stay within the lot boundary.  once again i lost control and had to retrieve my new flying hobby out of a tree and commenced my third flight when i was startled by an approaching helicopter flying at a pretty good clip straight ofer pretty lake.  i stopped adjacent to fly location on the other side of bay point marina.  it was a really sharp looking bell jet ranger with light blue paint scheme.  i got scared thinking i may have done something wrong and quickly brought my quad down to the parking lot as the helicopter jammed the cyclic forward and left in a arcing left hand turn which brought him directly over me.  i grabbed my quadcopter and controler and quickly placed them in my truck and drove to my girls house on mooring dr.  
    the next day i downloaded the videos from the quadcopter cam and reviewed the footage and was shocked to find that from the first position i selected to fly over by a stone wall was a black sphere hovering over the houses directly behind me.  the attached video picked it up on several frames however the quality is not great but it was a  large solid object hovering over the fourth and 5th home on 30th bay.  the first frame appearance is time signature 01:07.  the quad does one spin and a dip and the sphere appears to second at time signature signature 01:21 to 01:22.
   i then realized that that blue jet ranger helicopter wasn't looking for me.  it was here because this area is close to norfolk international airports flight path and that was most likely the it's origin.  also a point of interest nearby is the us navy special warfare amphibious base directly across the water.  the second attached video contains a few frames of the helicopter hauling butt over me probably in pursuit the the sphere.

  this is everything i can gather from the events of that day and time.  pretty interesting.  i sure wish i had seen it with my own eyes too but this is still significant knowing that it was likely picked up on radar and a helicopter was dispatched to check it out.
content.summary: Black sphere recorded by quadcopter cam during amatuer practice in parking lot.  i was unnerved when a light blue jet ranger helicopter approached me and i landed immediately.  the next day i discovered the black sphere on the cam video.

content.detailedDescription:
I just got off work and walked outside. i heard an airplane fly over, looked up at sky and then saw what i thought was some silver balloons floating in the sky.
i then realized that they were not balloons but three oval shaped objects silently moving in the sky.
they formed a triangle formation and began to either reflect light from the sun or signal lights to each other.
after the triangle formation they went in a straight up and down line and continued the flashing to each other.
they slowly and silently flew to the east and out of sight.
i was in complete awe because i could not identify what i saw as they did not move like a blimp or aircraft. i was able to take a video at the end of the citing.
content.summary: Three hovering shiny oval shaped objects. triangle formation and then in a straight up and down line. flashing/reflective light transmitting between objects.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Nous ã©tions sur notre balcon et mon conjoint a vu au sud-ouest une lumiã¨re ã©manant d'un nuage point il m'a demandã© de regarder et de me dire ce que je croyais que c'ã©tait. je suis une ancienne agent de bord, et je suis trã¨s accoutumã© aux avions etc reconnaã®tre une avion d'un hã©licoptã¨re ou autre. j'ai vu une lumiã¨re rã©flã©chir sur le nuage ã  partir de son intã©rieur. comme si il y avait un objet ã  l'intã©rieur qui est ã©clairã© le nuage. en quelques secondes l'objet n'ã©tait plus du tout dans le nuage et tu es rendu beaucoup plus bas, et se diriger en ligne droite vers l'est et ã  passer directement l'avant du vaisseau devant notre maison. il semble haine altitude d'environ de 300 pieds virgule un peu plus haut un arbre normala.   il me semblait ãªtre ã  une distance nettoyer de nous de 200 pieds environ.  l'objet n'avait pas du tout d'elle et avec la femme plus ou moins de 9 apprentis virgule assez cocasse man similaire un petit astronef que nous aurions vu dans les films de science-fiction des annã©es 50 point il avait un aileron ã  l'arriã¨re et un phare ã  l'avantoi.   nous avons vu une lumiã¨re rouge sur son cã´tã© droit en plein milieu, et nous avons vu une lumiã¨re rouge ã  l'arriã¨re. la vente ce vaisseau avait un pare-brise convexe ã©tait ã©clairã©e d'une forte lumiã¨re blanche de son intã©rieur. j'ai pu voir une crã©ature humanoã¯de ã  l'intã©rieur trã¨s foncã©, il est difficile ã  dire s'il ã©tait gris noir ou et est-ce la lumiã¨re qui le rendait ombragã©. l'ã©vã©nement totale du moment oã¹ nous l'avons vu dans le nuage jusqu'ã  ce qu'il disparaisse au loin vers l'est a durã© environ 2 minutesur.   et l'objet ne faisait presque pas de son comme lã©ger muramure.   j'ai attendu quelques heures virgule soit le lendemain matin si ma mã©moire est bonne avant de dã©cider de contacter le 911.  j'ai clairement senti que l'on ne me prenais pas au sã©rieux et la demoiselle m'a dit des rã©ponses totalement bidon, soit que c'ã©tait un avion qui passait au-dessus pour tuer les insectes point lorsque je lui ai dit que ã§a ne faisait aucun sens dans une ville ni ã  la hauteur que l'objet passã©, elle m'a dit que ã§a arrivait souvent et qu'elle vã©rifierai avec le fournisseur de service. je n'ai aucune autre nouvelle.  il est dommage que nous avons pas pour filmer l'ã©vã©nement car nous avons toujours notre tã©lã©phone avec nous et cette fois-ci il ã©tait dans le salon.  nous avons par contre immã©diatement fais un dessin pendant que tout ã©tait frais dans notre mã©moire, nous avons fait les dessins ã  cã´tã© de l'autre sans regarder ce que l'autre dessiner afin de comparer.  j'ã©value quel ã©vã©nement est arrivã©e vers minuit et 5 dans la nuit du 1er juin au 2 juin car j'ai regardã© mon tã©lã©phone et je suis rentrã©e dans la maison et il ã©tait minuit 10
content.summary: Sorti d'un nuage et ai desconduite et passã© en ligne droite devant nous.

content.detailedDescription: I was riding with a friend in his moms van. when we both glanced up and saw lights over the billboard in our friends property. i thought at first it was just new lights on the billboard. but it began to move at a very slow speed. we started to follow the vehicle and as it turned left we did as well. still driving down a street we noticed that the object was quite large and shaped like a triangle. it had lights all around the edges. i could only make out the difference in darkness between the night sky and the object/craft because of the lights. then not long after we headed down the street it began to speed up slowly. then as if it was in a sling shot or fired out a gun it took off and was gone.
content.summary: Triangle type aircraft flying over billboard lights all around edges. followed for short time until it took off at a rapid speed

content.detailedDescription:
While investigating a mufon sat case from march 19,2017 over mesquite nevada, a witness contacted sat investigator bob spearing (#9921140) to relay his story of a may 25th, 2017 close encounter with spheres and a black triangle over mesquite, nevada. mr. spearing asked the witness many questions as follows but nevada mufon may want to follow up with this very credible witness who is a 82 y/o retired city inspector for mesquite. he doesn't require anonymity.  his story:

"on may 25, 2017 at exactly 10;30 pm in my backyard in mesquite proper, my wife and i observed a group of 4 or 5 dark sphere-like objects, small, but it was hard to judge in the dark. they gave off the faintest "tan light".  there were either 4 or 5 of these objects doing circular and figure 8 patterns over my house at low altitude or they were coming in waves and there were many more that 4 or 5. this continued for 30 minutes till 11 pm. they made no sound and had no navigation green and red lights and no-anti-collision strobes. "

"then they departed. almost immediately after, we noticed a huge dark shape silently approaching the house at under 500 feet in altitude. it took 3 minutes to traverse the sky from southwest to northeast. it was bigger than a 747 and was jet black. it had no lights on its bottom but it gave off the faintest blue glow underneath. it was a triangle. however, the rear of the triangle was not a straight line. it seemed to indent a bit coming in from both points and then go straight again point to point. (this may have been wing tips-bob s.)." 

(witness stated the apparent size of the craft was bigger than my hand outstretch which means the object covered at least 10 degrees of sky at 500 feet in altitude making an actual size calculation possible.- bob s.) 

"i was too dumbfounded to get my camera."

(witness has agreed to draw and submit the shape of the craft but has not done so to date. -bob s.)

feel free to contact bob spearing (mufon #9921140) if necessary.
content.summary: Set of a minumum of 4 dark spheres followed by black triangle over mesquite nevada

content.detailedDescription:
I have most of it all on video. they are still here today 6/13/17. mother ship not at this time. way to much to type.  basically first mother ship was already here.  then i could not believe my eyes when a second one came in from my left same size as the first. 10 football fields long at lest. have on video. they came head to head and then stopped. smaller gard ships where all around them. there where over 20 of them. why the hell does the airforce not see this stuff. i called them and told them about the darlings. they told me it was a civilian matter. sorry. even though i am not a afraid, they told me today 6/13/17 i should be. i told them again i am sorry but i  am not, one of them responded again. you should be very afraid. i just ok.  when the time comes.Back to yesterday. i watched one of the mother ships leave, as one stayed behind that was wow. they worked late into the night. the small ships where picking up i could not see what from the ground on the hills behind my home. then they would go back to the mother ship and inter it then another would come out and takes it place. they would line up to go into the ships. it was also a rendezvous. if i looked at it from a military thought. with there cloaking ability and there visibility abilitys and with no sound. then they also could control the weather and the fact they can get past our radar. if they wanted war we would loss. fact!!!!! i am only at this time looking at it from a scientific point of view and the fact they have been coming to me for years now. they also allowed me to video them when just two weeks ago they said no.
i asked them to think about it and let me know. they did! i did a drawing for you and i  also took a pic of my pic i am in the process of copyright ingredients.  we need a well and septic tank. or i would give them for free to the world. but this is the reason they also are helping me they said. i  do not expect you to understand, but they do understand we have to have money, they do not. suckered big time. i  am so sorry. i really am.

content.summary: Two mother ships meet head too head. sm ships docking, leveling them. sm sh picking up so ming from ground bring back to lg ship. one mt, ship left, one stayed behind.

content.detailedDescription: I do a nightly skywatch, filming only clear or mostly clear nights, so weather is not a factor when filming. using a 'ghost-pro' camera, which films in the ultraviolet range, also picking up some infra-red, but starlight is not filmable. this camera is tripod-mounted and unattended, it is equipped with a microphone, but the event was silent. upon review of the night of june 8, 2017, i felt i had filmed an unknown object, and there is an airplane that happens to be flying in the area, just above the time/date stamp, which is set to be accurate. the object appears some distance from plane, and is apparently near the same altitude. it seems to fade into view, brighten and hover, then moving from the south to the north, and fading from view. event lasts a full 5 seconds. i slowed the video by 50% and orbs, not visible at normal speed, flash from several positions around object. camera is oriented with north at bottom screen, east at the right side.
content.summary: Upon review of my nightly skywatch video, an unidentifiable object was seen

content.detailedDescription: Approx. 4 mi distant.  red firelike glow.  start of forest fire.  classic   ufo shape; was first on ground then rose up to treetop level and followed and paced myself and two partners in autofor approx. 4 or 5 miles to west end of red lake; thenascendedto a high altitude and continued to pace us for approx. 30 miles to the village of red lake, mn.  when i got to my home the disc was at a high altitude but was stationary. the two other persons that were with me on that occasion are currently alive and can verify this account.  my feelings at that particular time was that was a genuine first hand sighting of a ufo.
content.summary: Classic ufo disc shape
